title: Help with finding typefaces created 2000 to 2008
content:
Hi,

I’m only new to this but currently for a uni assignment - i am searching for typefaces created from 2000 to now. But more specifically typefaces used for main text/copy in magazines. Anything would really helpful as i have no clue where to start looking.

 [‹ the apple iPhone font???](http://web.archive.org/web/20080328212908/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43042 "Go to previous forum topic") [design museum script font - any ideas? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080328212908/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43117 "Go to next forum topic")
author: yubba_zubba

comments.content:
For example:

[Favourite Typefaces of 2007](http://web.archive.org/web/20080328212908/http:/typographica.org/001124.php)  
 [Favourite Typefaces of 2006](http://web.archive.org/web/20080328212908/http:/typographica.org/001103.php)  
 [Favourite Typefaces of 2005](http://web.archive.org/web/20080328212908/http:/typographica.org/001045.php)  
 [Favourite Typefaces of 2004](http://web.archive.org/web/20080328212908/http:/typographica.org/000969.php)

hi there, i made this one 2007 i will release the next version in a few months.

[http://inde-graphics.deviantart.com/art/advent-font-57338302](http://web.archive.org/web/20080328212908/http:/inde-graphics.deviantart.com/art/advent-font-57338302 "http://inde-graphics.deviantart.com/art/advent-font-57338302")
